name: raycast-grok
title: Grok
description: Access Grok AI conveniently through Raycast
author: CaicoLeung

data.title: grok-3-beta (Our flagship model that excels at enterprise tasks like data extraction, programming, and text summarization.)
grok-3-mini-beta (A lightweight model that thinks before responding. Excels at quantitative tasks that involve math and reasoning.)
grok-2-vision-1212 (Our latest multimodal which processes documents, diagrams, charts, screenshots, and photographs.)
grok-2-image-1212 (Our latest image generation model capable of generating multiple images from text prompt.
grok-2-1212 (Our latest text model with improved efficiency, speed and capabilities.
grok-beta (Our latest image understanding model that can process a wide variety of visual information, including documents, diagrams, charts, screenshots, and photographs.)
